title: The Case of the Vanishing Violinist - A Disappearing Act
author: Alan Roman
content_markdown: # The Case of the Vanishing Violinist. ## A Disappearing Act. Lord Ashworth's grand estate was thrown into chaos. The renowned violinist, Madame Evangeline Moreau, had disappeared during a private concert. Inspector Davies surveyed the scene, his eyes scanning the opulent drawing-room. No sign of forced entry, he mused, examining a scattered sheet music score. “The killer was among us.”
